item.title: 2019年AFA年会论文专题所有推文
item.description:
原文

2019年AFA年会论文专题所有推文

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递
金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。


　

美国金融学年会(AFA Annual Meeting)介绍


美国金融学年会由美国金融学会(American Finance Association)主办，每年一月初轮流在美国的主要城市举行。美国金融学年会是金融领域最高档次的学术年会，年会入选的论文通常来自全球著名高校的学者、科研机构人员或业界人士。

　　2019年1月4-6日，第79届美国金融学年会在美国亚特兰大召开。本届年会包含了金融学各领域的前沿研究，有行为金融、资产定价、公司金融、资本市场、金融科技、金融网络等。

　　我们从本届年会中挑选了不同专题的20篇文章予以介绍，和大家分享国际上最新的金融学研究进展。　　

 

（点击文章标题阅读推文内容）

分组（一）：

涵盖了Asset Pricing Anomalies, The Relation Between Expected Returns and Betas, Mispricing 与 Selecting Mutual Funds共4个专题。

1. 所见非所得：市场异象的交易成本

——What You See is Not What You Get:The Costs of Trading Market Anomalies


2. 资产定价异象与低风险之谜

——Asset Pricing Anomalies and the Low-risk Puzzle


3. 何时下注：盈余公告前的股票投机

——Time-Varying Demand for Lottery: Speculation Ahead of Earnings Announcements


4. Alpha离散度与基金业绩评价

——Cross-Sectional Alpha Dispersion and Performance Evaluation

 

分组（二）：

涵盖了International Finance 与 Analysts, News, Media and Market Sentiment共2个专题。

1. 中国股市的真实价值

——The Real Value of China's Stock Market


2. 伤心到伤身：家庭暴力与股市收益

——When Paper Losses Get Physical: Domestic Violence and Stock Returns


3. 基金清盘：个人投资者对账面及实际盈亏的反应

——Fully Closed: Individual Responses to Realized Capital Gains and Losses


4. 识别公开卖空策略行为

——Detecting Opportunistic Behavior in Public Short Campaigns

 

分组（三）：

涵盖了Insiders and Incentives, Behavioral Corporate Finance 与 New Perspectives on Risk共3个专题。

1. 内部人交易能赚多少？

——The Dollar Profits to Insider Trading


2. 被动的对冲基金为何变得激进？

——What Causes Passive Hedge Funds to Become Activists？


3.市场会乘除吗？金融市场中的非比率思维

——Can the Market Multiply and Divide? Non-Proportional Thinking in Financial Markets

 

分组（四）：

涵盖了Market Mispricing: Extrapolation, Speculation, and Disclosure, Investor Psychology 与 The Role of Media in Finance共3个专题。

1. 学习，快与慢

——Learning Fast or Slow


2. 事倍功半

——Doing Less with More


3. 新闻驱动型交易：谁何时阅读新闻?

——News-Driven Trading: Who Reads the News and When?

 

分组（五）：

涵盖了Social Corporate Finance, Barriers to Boardrooms 与 Empirical Compensation and Incentives共3个专题。

1. “杀一儆百”：惩罚对未受罚公司的警示作用

——Punish One, Teach A Hundred: The Sobering Effect of Punishment on the Unpunished


2. 性别差异的根源和实际影响：来自CEO成长期的证据

——The Origins and Real Effects of the Gender Gap: Evidence from CEOs' Formative Years


3. 事与愿违的高管限薪：以中国市场为例

——Restricting CEO Pay Backfires: Evidence from China

 

分组（六）：

涵盖了Expectations in Household Finance, FinTech Applications in Credit and Asset Markets 与 Finance and Development共3个专题。

1. 房价风险认知与购房决定

——Perception of House Price Risk and Homeownership


2. 金融科技与企业选择：来自电商平台贷款的证据

——Fintech and Firm Selection: Evidence from E-commerce Platform Lending


3. 谁受益于美国制造业的衰退？——来自142663家中国境内外企业的证据

——Who Benefits from the Decline of American Manufacturing? Evidence from 142,663 Foreign and Domestic Entries in China

【2019 AFA】谁受益于美国制造业的衰退？——来自142663家中国境内外企业的证据

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 选文:易煜岑 初审:汪斌 终审:兰袁 编辑:吴文彬

原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Minwen Li (Tsinghua University)

Tanakorn Makaew (U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission)

Vojislav Maksimovic (University of Maryland)


摘要

本文将中美两国永久正常贸易关系的建立作为一种外生冲击，研究贸易自由化对在中国的本土企业和外国新企业的影响。对进入率的正向影响主要集中在外国公司。外国进入者的出口倾向对贸易冲击更敏感。本国新企业的出口倾向因地区金融发展而异。外国进入者受到的融资约束较少，增长更快，特别是在欠发达地区。本文研究表明，在新兴市场中，贸易全球化首先受益的可能是外国投资者，而非本国企业和企业家。


Who Benefits from the Decline of American Manufacturing? Evidence from 142,663 Foreign and Domestic Entries in China


Abstract

Using the establishment of U.S.-China Permanent Normal Trade Relation as a plausibly exogenous shock, we study the effect of trade liberalization on domestic entrepreneurial entry and new foreign firms in China. The positive effect on entry rate is concentrated among foreign firms. Foreign entrants’ export propensity is more responsive to trade shock. Domestic entrants’ export propensity varies with local financial development. Foreign entrants are less financially constrained and grow faster, especially in undeveloped areas. Our results suggest that in emerging markets, trade globalization may in the first instance benefit foreign investors rather than domestic firms and entrepreneurs.


原文：

Li, Minwen, Tanakorn Makaew and Vojislav Maksimovic, Who Benefits from the Decline of American Manufacturing? Evidence from 142,663 Foreign and Domestic Entries in China, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, December 9, 2018.


Session: 

Finance and Development

item.title: 【2019 AFA】金融科技与企业选择：来自电商平台贷款的证据
item.description:
原文

【2019 AFA】金融科技与企业选择：来自电商平台贷款的证据

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递
金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 这是“金融学前沿论文速递”第736篇推送

  • 选文:汪斌 审稿:李琛 终审:李金龙 编辑:吴文彬

  • 仅用于学术交流，原文版权归原作者和原发刊所有


原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Yi Huang (Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies)

Ye Li (Ohio State University)

Hongzhe Shan (Swiss Finance Institute)


摘要

本文首次提供了受大数据驱动的金融科技影响企业动态的证据。本文用阿里巴巴（中国最大的电子商务平台和金融科技贷款机构）的综合数据，检验了金融科技信贷对小企业规模分布的因果性影响。研究发现，平台信贷促进了企业选择——信贷促使规模更大、声誉更好的电商的市场份额更快增长。为揭示信贷传导机制，研究了信贷对不同行业产品定价的影响。本文还发现了一个动态效应：用平台专有算法计算的公司信用评分与其市场份额和声誉高度相关，由此说明，公司市场地位和金融科技信贷之间的反馈循环加速了公司选择过程，促进了企业成长。


Fintech and Firm Selection: Evidence from E-commerce Platform Lending


Abstract

This paper provides the first evidence on how fintech powered by big data impacts firm dynamics. With comprehensive data from Alibaba, the largest e-commerce platform and the largest fintech lender in China, we estimate the causal impact of fintech credit on the size distribution of small businesses. We find that platform credit promotes firm selection – credit leads to stronger growth of market share for e-commerce merchants that are larger and more reputable. To unveil the credit transmission mechanism, we examine the impact of credit under different industry conditions and the impact on product pricing. We also document a dynamic effect: firms’ credit score, assigned by platform's proprietary algorithm, is highly correlated with their market share and reputation, so a feedback loop between firms’ market status and fintech credit that speeds up the process of firm selection in this fast growing entrepreneurial space.  


原文：

Huang, Yi, Ye Li and Hongzhe Shan, Fintech and Firm Selection: Evidence from E-commerce Platform Lending, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, May 1, 2018.


Session:

FinTech Applications in Credit and Asset Markets

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递
金融学前沿论文速递

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 选文:叶茜茜 审稿:王志诚 终审:谢晓飞 编辑:吴文彬

  • 仅用于学术交流，原文版权归原作者和原发刊所有


原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Manuel Adelino (Duke University, CEPR and NBER)

Antoinette Schoar (MIT, CEPR and NBER)

Felipe Severino (Dartmouth College)


摘要

本文研究房价风险认知对购房选择的影响。大多数美国家庭(71%)认为住房是“安全”的投资，但租房者却认为购房有风险。不同人群的风险认知存在很大差异，在控制了可观测的因素，如收入、储蓄或地理位置后，差异仍然显著。当前的住房决策、未来是购还是租都与对房价风险的认知密切相关。家庭因财务约束、预期住址流动或收入不确定性而面临的住房风险会影响买或租的决定，但不会减轻风险认知对购房选择的影响。最后，本文证明所有家庭都会根据过去（当地）的房价变化更新其房价风险认知，但租房者更新的速度要慢得多。由于房价风险认知对租房者的购房决策影响更大，这或许可以解释为何他们在房价上涨期间推迟购房，甚至延长了房地产周期。


Perception of House Price Risk and Homeownership


Abstract

This paper analyzes the importance of household perceptions of house price risk in explaining homeownership choice. While a majority of US households (71%) believes that housing is a “safe” investment, renters are much more likely to perceive housing as risky. Risk perceptions vary across demographic groups, but significant differences persist after controlling for observables, such as income, savings, or location. Current housing decisions and future intentions to buy versus rent are strongly correlated with perceptions of house price risk. Households’ exposure to housing risk due to financial constraints, expected mobility or labor income risk affect the decision to buy versus rent but do not mitigate the impact of risk perceptions on housing choices. Finally, we show that all households update their beliefs about the riskiness of housing in response to past (local) house price changes, but renters are much slower to update than owners. Since renters’ decisions to buy are especially sensitive to their perception of house price risk, it might explain their delayed entry into home ownership during a house price run-up and even prolong the housing cycle.


原文：

Adelino,Manuel, Felipe Severino and Antoinette Schoar，Perception of House Price Risk and Homeownership，2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, September 2018.


Session：

Expectations in Household Finance

【2019 AFA】事与愿违的高管限薪：以中国市场为例

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 选文:戴晔咛 审稿:吴文彬 终审:张斌 编辑:吴文彬

  • 仅用于学术交流，原文版权归原作者和原发刊所有


原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Kee-Hong Bae (York University)

Zhaoran Gong (Hong Kong Polytechnic University)

Wilson Tong (Hong Kong Polytechnic University)


摘要

本文用2009年中国中央企业高管限薪事件，研究高管限薪的影响。限薪央企的CEO薪酬比不限薪的锐减，薪酬－业绩敏感度也大幅降低。为了弥补降薪的影响，CEO会增加额外津贴用于消费，为了私利挪用公司资源，最终会导致企业绩效大幅下降。本文研究揭示，高管限薪削减了高管的积极性，可能违背了初衷。本文的结论揭示了高管限薪的不良后果。


Restricting CEO Pay Backfires: Evidence from China


Abstract

Using the pay restriction imposed on CEOs of centrally administered state-owned enterprises (CSOEs) in China in 2009, we study the effects of limiting CEO pay. Compared with firms not subject to the restriction, the CEOs of CSOEs experience a significant pay cut. Pay-performance sensitivity for these firms also significantly decreases. In response to the pay cut, CEOs increase their consumption of perks and siphon off firm resources for their own benefit. Ultimately, the performance of these firms drops significantly following the pay restriction. Our findings suggest that restricting CEO pay distorts CEO incentives and brings unintended consequences. Our findings caution against limiting the pay of CEOs.


原文：

Bae, Kee-Hong, Zhaoran Gong and Wilson Tong, Restricting CEO Pay Backfires: Evidence from China, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, August 16, 2018.


Session: 

Empirical Compensation and Incentives

【2019 AFA】性别差异的根源和实际影响：来自CEO成长期的证据

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递
金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 这是“金融学前沿论文速递”第732篇推送

  • 选文:孙培伦 审稿:黄成志 终审:张肖飞 编辑:吴文彬

  • 仅用于学术交流，原文版权归原作者和原发刊所有


原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Ran Duchin (University of Washington)

Mikhail Simutin (University of Toronto)

Denis Sosyura (Arizona State University)


摘要

CEO倾向于将资金投给同一部门中的男性而非女性经理。本文基于人口普查数据，发现上述性别差异源于CEO成长于男性主导的家庭——只有父亲工作或父亲的教育程度高于母亲。上过男校或成长于性别不平等邻里环境的CEO会加剧该差距。性别对资本预算有影响，这引入了摩擦并影响投资效率。总之，本文的研究说明，性别差异源于CEO成长期形成的偏好，会产生显著的实际影响。


The Origins and Real Effects of the Gender Gap: Evidence from CEOs' Formative Years


Abstract

CEOs allocate more investment capital to male managers than to female managers in the same divisions. Using data from individual Census records, we find that this gender gap is driven by CEOs who grew up in male-dominated families—those where the father was the only income earner and had more education than the mother. The gender gap also increases for CEOs who attended all-male high schools and grew up in neighborhoods with greater gender inequality. The effect of gender on capital budgeting introduces frictions and erodes investment efficiency. Overall, the gender gap originates in CEO preferences developed during formative years and produces significant real effects.  


原文：

Duchin, Ran, Mikhail Simutin and Denis Sosyura, The Origins and Real Effects of the Gender Gap: Evidence from CEOs' Formative Years, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, June 2, 2018.

【2019 AFA】“杀一儆百”：惩罚对未受罚公司的警示作用

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递
金融学前沿论文速递

精选推送国内外最前沿的金融学论文。服务学术研究、投融资实务和政策决策，推动国内金融学研究快速与国际接轨。关注人数超过7万。本号由上海财经大学讲席教授徐龙炳、陆蓉带领的“上财金融创新团队”负责。

  • 这是“金融学前沿论文速递”第731篇推送

  • 选文:海婷婷 审稿:孙欣钰 终审:李金龙 编辑:吴文彬

原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Francesco D'Acunto (Boston College)

Michael Weber (University of Chicago)

Jin Xie (Chinese University of Hong Kong)


摘要

同行被惩罚凸显了惩罚的可能性和消极后果，从而引起没被惩罚的同行行为发生变化。本文在一个独特的背景下检验了这一机制。中国的上市国企比非国有上市企业较少受到传统治理机制的约束，同行企业因违规行为被处罚后，上市国企会削减对关联企业的贷款担保、增强董事会的独立性、削减低效率投资，进而提高全要素生产率。在同行企业处罚公告发布前后，上市国企累计超额收益为正，说明同行被处罚与其他同行股东价值之间存在正相关关系。此外，上市国企并没有采用更隐蔽的输送途径——关联企业的银行信贷和投资都减少了，而且这种情况在同行被处罚后没有反转。


Punish One, Teach A Hundred: The Sobering Effect of Punishment on the Unpunished


Abstract

Direct experience of a peer's punishment might make salient the probability and negative consequences of facing punishment, and hence induce a change in the behavior of non-punished peers. We test for this mechanism in a unique setting. After observing peer firms punished for wrongdoing, Chinese listed State Owned Enterprises (SOEs) - which are less disciplined by traditional governance mechanisms than non-SOEs - cut the resources they tunnel to related private parties via loan guarantees, move to more independent boards, cut inefficient investment, and increase total factor productivity. SOEs experience positive cumulative abnormal returns around the announcements of peers' punishment, which suggests a positive association between peers' punishment and shareholder value. SOEs do not shift to more opaque forms of tunneling - the bank credit and investment of related parties drop and do not revert after peers' punishment.


原文：

D'Acunto, Francesco, Michael Weber, and Jin Xie, Punish One, Teach A Hundred: The Sobering Effect of Punishment on the Unpunished, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, January 16, 2018.

美国金融学年会(AFA Annual Meeting)介绍


美国金融学年会由美国金融学会(American Finance Association)主办，每年一月初轮流在美国的主要城市举行。美国金融学年会是金融领域最高档次的学术年会，年会入选的论文通常来自全球著名高校的学者、科研机构人员或业界人士。

　　2019年1月4-6日，第79届美国金融学年会在美国亚特兰大召开。本届年会包含了金融学各领域的前沿研究，有行为金融、资产定价、公司金融、资本市场、金融科技、金融网络等。

　　我们从本届年会中挑选了不同专题的20篇文章予以介绍，和大家分享国际上最新的金融学研究进展。

【2019 AFA】新闻驱动型交易：谁何时阅读新闻?

原创： 上财金融创新团队 金融学前沿论文速递

FinanEx

原刊和作者：

AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper 2019年1月

Anastassia Fedyk (Harvard University)


摘要

本文利用信息缓慢扩散与意见分歧的典型模型，探究信息发布前后交易量增加之谜。用金融专业人士的新闻点击量这一特殊的数据集，来区分在不同时间看到新闻的投资者之间的交易，以及对同一新闻存在意见分歧的投资者之间的交易。与信息缓慢扩散理论一致，投资者关注时点的分散度能强烈预测盈余公告发布前后的日交易量激增，也能预测个别新闻报道发布后几分钟内的交易量激增。以投资者阅读新闻的异质性来度量的意见分歧，解释交易量激增的能力较弱，但当新闻模糊度高时，解释力强。


News-Driven Trading: Who Reads the News and When?


Abstract

This paper explores the puzzle of increased trading volume around informational releases through the lens of canonical models of gradual information diffusion and differences of opinion. I use a unique dataset of clicks on news by key finance professionals to distinguish between trading among investors who see the news at different times and trading among investors who see the same news but disagree regarding its interpretation. Consistent with gradual information diffusion, dispersion in the timing of investors' attention is strongly predictive of daily trading volume surges around earnings announcements and volume surges within minutes of individual news articles. The differences of opinion channel, measured as heterogeneity of investors reading the news, is generally weaker in explaining trading volume surges, but plays a larger role around more ambiguous news.


原文：

Fedyk, Anastassia, News-Driven Trading: Who Reads the News and When?, 2019 AFA Annual Meeting Working Paper, Oct 3, 2018.
